snippet: President Park Geun-hye of South Korea urged Prime Minister Shinzo Abe of Japan to acknowledge Japan’s 20th-century aggressions.
lead_paragraph: President Park Geun-hye of South Korea urged Prime Minister Shinzo Abe of Japan to acknowledge Japan’s 20th-century aggressions.

headline.main: South Korea Assails Japan on Wartime Brothels
headline.print_headline: South Korea Assails Japan on Wartime Brothels
